title: Real-time synchronization of task updates
description: Verify that task updates made on one client are reflected in real-time on other connected clients without data loss or delay.

steps.description: Open CODIA Tracker on two different clients logged into the same project.
Update the status of a task on client A.
Verify the updated status is reflected immediately on client B without page reload.
Simultaneously update multiple tasks on client B.
Verify all changes are reflected in real-time on client A accurately.

title: Master Map progress bars and KPIs update correctly
description: Ensure that the Master Map dashboard shows accurate overall and phase-wise project progress with real-time updating progress bars and KPIs when task statuses change.

steps.description: Navigate to the Master Map dashboard.
Verify initial progress bars and KPIs reflect the tasks' statuses from the backend.
Update statuses of multiple tasks affecting different phases.
Verify that progress bars and KPIs on Master Map update immediately and correctly correspond to the changes.
Introduce a task blocker and update the task status to BLOCKED.
Verify that the Master Map reflects blocker states as part of the progress visualization.

title: Enforce task dependency and blocker constraints
description: Validate that task status updates respect dependencies and blocker relationships and enforce constraints preventing invalid status changes.

steps.description: Identify a task that depends on other tasks and has blockers.
Attempt to mark a dependent task as DONE when its prerequisite tasks are not completed.
Verify the system blocks the status update and shows an appropriate error message.
Clear blockers and complete prerequisite tasks.
Update the dependent task status to DONE.
Verify that the update is accepted and reflected across all views.

title: Phase-based hierarchical checklist updates and synchronization
description: Ensure hierarchical task structures in the phase-based checklist allow status changes, notes addition, and blocker viewing, syncing in real-time across clients.

steps.description: Navigate to the Checklist tab and expand a phase with hierarchical tasks.
Update the status of a parent task and its child tasks.
Add notes to a task and toggle blocker status.
Verify that updates are synced immediately on another client and reflected correctly.
Collapse and expand checklist sections.
Verify the UI retains correct expanded/collapsed states and data consistency after updates.

title: Timeline and Gantt chart visualization accuracy and interaction
description: Verify that the interactive Timeline and Gantt charts display tasks ordered by date with correct status indicators, support zooming, tooltips, and opening detail modals.

steps.description: Navigate to the Timeline view.
Confirm all tasks are ordered chronologically with accurate status colors.
Navigate to the Gantt Chart view and zoom between 50% and 200%.
Ensure zoom adjusts timeline scale smoothly without data loss.
Hover over task bars to display tooltips.
Verify tooltips show correct task metadata.
Click on a task bar to open the detail modal.
Check the modal displays correct detailed task information.

title: Kanban board drag-and-drop task status updates
description: Test drag-and-drop functionality of tasks across Kanban columns and verify status updates and real-time backend synchronization.

steps.description: Navigate to the Kanban Board.
Drag a task card from Pending to In Progress.
Verify the task status updates in the backend and UI reflects the change immediately.
Drag a task card to Blocked column.
Ensure the task status changes to BLOCKED and is synced across clients.
Try dragging a task with dependency constraints.
Verify the system enforces constraints, blocks invalid status changes, and shows errors.

title: Setup Wizard multi-step configuration and milestones load
description: Validate the Setup Wizard guides users through all five steps, loads milestone data from the database, and saves configuration to localStorage correctly.

steps.description: Start the Setup Wizard.
Verify each step loads correctly (Business Info, Infrastructure, Financial, AI Models, Review).
Check that milestone tasks are loaded from the database and displayed.
Fill out form fields with valid data on each step.
Complete the wizard and save configuration.
Verify configuration is saved accurately to localStorage.
Reload the wizard and verify pre-population of milestone data from localStorage or database.

title: Founder Guide accessibility and UI interaction
description: Ensure the Founder Guide content is accessible, expandable, and collapsible across all six sections with no rendering errors.

steps.description: Navigate to the Founder Guide.
Verify that the full static content loads correctly without errors.
Expand each section (Accounts, Domain, Finance, Security, Dev Tools, Legal) one by one.
Verify content within each section is displayed accurately.
Collapse each section and verify it hides content correctly.

title: Visual Master Map graph rendering and interactions
description: Verify that the Visual Master Map renders task dependencies and relationships correctly as an interactive graph and updates with real-time data changes.

steps.description: Navigate to the Master Map component.
Verify that tasks and their dependencies are correctly visualized as nodes and edges.
Simulate status changes and dependency updates on tasks.
Verify the graph reflects updates in real-time and interaction elements remain responsive.
Test graph zoom, pan, and node selection interactions.
Confirm interactions work smoothly with no rendering glitches.

title: Mermaid Diagram Viewer load and toggle visualization modes
description: Validate that the Mermaid Diagram Viewer fetches .mmd files from the database and renders interactive SVG diagrams correctly with Visual and Code toggling.

steps.description: Open the Diagram Viewer and request a mermaid diagram file.
Verify the diagram is rendered as an interactive SVG.
Toggle between Visual and Code views.
Confirm the content switches appropriately with no data loss.
Interact with the diagram (zoom, pan, select elements).
Verify all interactions function correctly.

title: Activity Logs real-time capture and display
description: Ensure that system and user task event logs are captured accurately with timestamps and displayed in a live-updating feed without requiring page refresh.

steps.description: Navigate to the Activity Logs feed.
Verify initial log entries load ordered by timestamp.
Perform task updates and system events (e.g., status changes, blocker additions).
Confirm new log entries appear live with accurate event descriptions and timestamps.
Simulate rapid multiple events to test feed stability.
Verify feed remains responsive and shows all events correctly.

title: Supabase backend API endpoint correctness and security
description: Verify all Supabase backend API endpoints correctly handle requests, provide expected data formats, enforce permissions, and maintain security and performance.

steps.description: Send authorized GET requests to all listed endpoints (/gap_analysis, /tracker_app_data, /tasks, /phases, /documents, /logs) with valid parameters.
Verify responses match expected schemas and data contents.
Send PUT requests to update task statuses with valid and invalid data.
Verify updates succeed for valid data and fail with proper error messages for invalid or unauthorized attempts.
Attempt unauthorized access or mutations.
Verify backend denies access and returns appropriate error codes.
Subscribe to WebSocket realtime channel and simulate task changes.
Verify client receives updates promptly and securely.
